entry.title: Cookshack SM360 - Electric Smoker Oven - 550 lb. Capacity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cookshack
Type: Commercial Smoker
Price: 12864.00

The Cookshack SM360 is part of their "SmartSmokers" line of smoker ovens. This is an extremely versatile, electrically-powered smoker that can produce low-n-slow barbecue, cold smoked meats, cheeses, or it can be used as a standard oven when used without wood. It has a capacity of up to 550 pounds per load.

This smoker oven can be operated 24/7 for a constant output and increased profitability. It's been designed for restaurants and commercial operations which predominately sell smoked meats or barbecue on their menu. This is a top-quality smoker that was made in the U.S.A.

      • Heat is supplied by an electronically-controlled heating element
      • Smoke is created as wood smolders in the wood box
      • The heating element works only when the door is completely closed
      • Produce hot foods or cold smoked foods with optional cold smoke kit
      • Safe, contained wood box slides out
      • Drippings exit the bottom of the smoker into a removable drip pan for a clean, safe operation
      • IQ5 Digital controller includes 8 programmable, customizable cooking presets
      • Tough double-walled stainless steel construction surrounds 850° Fahrenheit "SpinGlas" insulation
      • Retains heat and remains cool to the touch on the outside
      • Made in America

    FOOD CAPACITY

    63 square feet. Or 550 lb. pork butts, 500 lb. brisket, 270 lb. ribs, or 100 whole chickens per load.

    SPECS

    Model SM360
    Dimensions (WHD) 47" x 72" x 39.75"
    Cooking Area 63 square feet
    Shelves (28) 18" x 18" grills
    Temperature Range 130° to 300° Fahrenheit
    Electrical (4) 1,500 watt, 50 amps, 220v single phase
    Ship Weight 775 lb

    LEAD TIME

    Because this is a non-stocking item, it may require an extended lead time to ship to you. If you need this item by a certain date, please contact us.

    WARRANTY

    Two year limited warranty including 90 days full parts and labour.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Cookshack FEC750SS - Pellet Rotisserie Smoker Oven - 750 lb. Capacity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cookshack
Type: Commercial Smoker
Price: 28308.00

The Cookshack FEC750SS is part of their "Fast Eddy's" line of rotisserie, pellet smoker ovens. It gives you delicious, consistent smoking with 100% wood pellets and has a per-load capacity of 750 pounds. It has Cookshack's "IQ5" digital control system which gives you 8 programmable, customizable cooking presets.

It features quick start-up and fast heat recovery during use. Great for food trucks, caterers, and restaurants, as well as barbecue competitions. This is a top-quality smoker oven that was made in the U.S.A.

      • Heat and smoke are supplied by 100% wood pellets
      • Offset firebox and convection fan circulates smoke and heat for even temperatures
      • Drippings exit the bottom of the smoker into a removable drip pan for a clean, safe operation
      • IQ5 digital controller includes 8 programmable, customizable cooking presets
      • Tough double-walled stainless steel construction surrounds 850°F Spin-Glas insulation
      • Retains heat and remains cool to the touch on the outside
      • Pellets are clean burning, produce very little ash and create low creosote buildup
      • Approved by all major cooking competition sanctioning bodies
      • Made In America.

FOOD CAPACITY

750 lb. pork butts, 700 lb. brisket, 300 lb. ribs, or 110 chickens per load.

SPECS

Model FEC750SS
Dimensions (WHD) 84" x 77" x 89"
Cooking Area 75 square feet
Shelves Fifteen 60" x 11.5" rotisserie grills
Temperature Range 160° to 400° Fahrenheit
Amps 15
Voltage 120
Watts 1,800
BTU 108,000
Fuel Source 100% wood pellets
Pellet Hopper Capacity 80 lb
Ship Weight 2100 lb

LEAD TIME

Because this is a non-stocking item, it may require an extended lead time to ship to you. If you need this item by a certain date, please contact us.

WARRANTY

Two year limited warranty including 90 days full parts and labour.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Cookshack FEC240 - Pellet Smoker Oven - 240 lb. Capacity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cookshack
Type: Commercial Smoker
Price: 12864.00

The Cookshack FEC240 is part of their "Fast Eddy's" line of pellet smoker ovens. It gives you delicious, consistent smoking with 100% wood pellets and has a per-load capacity of 240 pounds. It has Cookshack's "IQ5" digital control system which gives you 8 programmable, customizable cooking presets.

The FEC120 features an offset firebox and a convection fan to circulate smoke and heat for steady temperatures throughout the unit. It is the perfect choice for large scale operations.

entry.title: Nu-Vu SMOKE13 - Electric Cook and Hold Smoker Oven - 350 lb. Capacity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nu-Vu
Type: Commercial Smoker
Price: 16233.00

The Nu-Vu SMOKE13 is a full-height smoker that will allow you to dry bake, bake with moisture, warm, slow-cook, or hold and cook -- and all this in one simple machine! It has a capcity to hold 26 half size sheet pans, or 13 full size sheet pans.

Some of the features the SMOKE13 has are its "V-AIR" technology. This is an air flow design that will allow the smoke to flow throughout the cavity evenly. And you'll be able to control the humidity during the cooking process, so that your meat is always tender -- every time!

Nu-Vu is a brand who specializes in this type of cooking equipment, so with the SMOKE13 smoker oven you're going to be getting a high quality smoker that will last you for many years to come.

      • Solid State controls
      • Bake Temperature up to 350°F (177°C)
      • Hold Temperature up to 250°F (122°C)
      • Independent Indicator Light for Smoke, Humidity, Heat & Hold
      • Stainless steel construction
      • Heavy Duty Casters (2 Locking & 2 Non-Locking)
      • Includes (13) Stainless Steel Racks
      • One-handed door handle operation
      • Adjustable buzzer
      • 60 Minute Countdown Timer
      • Indefinite Hold Timer
      • Up to a 350 lb Capacity
      • Stainless Steel Door
      • Includes Removable Drip Pan & Trough for Grease Collection

VIDEO

SPECS

Electrical 208v/60/1‐ph, 23 amps
Sheets Half-Size
Capacity (13) 18" x 26" or (26) 13" x 18"
Humidity Yes
Controls Solid State
Racks 13 Chrome racks
Door Stainless Steel
Door Left-hinged

FREE SHIPPING

*This item has free shipping in Canada! Now, some conditions may apply, so please see our shipping policies or contact us for more information.

For instance, even though an item has free shipping, if it weighs over 75 pounds, you may be charged a tailgate fee (unless you have a forklift or a loading dock). Or if you live in a rural or island location, there may be some charges. Otherwise, this item ships free all across Canada!

WARRANTY

Two year parts and one year labor warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET
